DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Tolerance Follow-On Formula Fed Children From 36-48 Months Age
DOC.criteria: Child 3648 month age Child currently attend daycare attend 6 month less Has consume cow 's milk cow 's milkbased beverage 48 hour prior randomization Signed informed consent Child receive food product supplement contain probiotic prebiotics 15 day prior randomization Child allergy gluten serious concurrent illness interfere general management child Child diarrhea acute respiratory infection 48 hour prior randomization Child 's zscore weight height < 3 accord World Health Organization criterion
